Summary: 5 lights formed a v-shape over Ocean Beach, San Francisco.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy friend and i were on our way to a friends house, we were driving down the great highway right off the beach and my friend mentioned that she smelled gun powder and i told her it may be a bond fire or something. i looked to my left facing the ocean side and i noticed strange lights. it formed a v-shape. ther was 1 bigger light at the bottom an two smaller lights on each side forming a wide v-shape. it looked quite big, i didn't see any form of the shape, it was suspended over the ocean and made no noise. my friend was so scared that it would be coming our direction that she ran all the red lights. i didn't feel scared i was very curious. we parked half a mile down to get a better look but it was already gone.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around November 23rd 2008
